body: Switch out vivi for robin. As well as sanjis sister for either Rebecca or her sister. Put carrot in her sulong form and then we have the hottest cast from one piece.
Eh, good stuff. I completely dropped one piece in the past couple years, is it still good?
If I could pick my top 5 hottest girls in one piece I'd go with yamato, robin, hancock, monet, and nami.
Surprised it has the bunny and character from Sanji`s backstory
